title: Disney Wants A Star Wars Game Every 6 Months - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.27.22
description:
Star Wars every 6 months? Marvel games not sharing a universe? Blessing and Greg talk all about it as well as Overwatch 2 wanting to be more like Fortnite and Cyberpunk 2077 continuing to skyrocket.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:10:54 - Housekeeping

Kinda Feudy has ANOTHER brand new survey. This time it’s not just video game questions. Don’t ask why, just go with the flow. It’s the most fun survey you’ll fill out this week so hop on over to Blessing’s twitter, find the link and fill it out. https://twitter.com/BlessingJr/status/1574515940045115393


Week 3 of the Kinda Funny Football League was absolute insanity! Aaron Rodgers, Rahul Kohli and the Packers took on Parris Lilley, Whitta, and Buccaneers. Also, Nick Scarpino did his best to make sure the 49ers would fail. Did he succeed? Check out the VOD now on youtube.com/KindaFunnyPlays


The Roper Report  -

00:15:43 - Disney Wants A New Star Wars Game Every 6 Months
00:28:54 - Marvel has no plans for video game MCU
00:43:27 - Ad
00:45:40 - Overwatch 2 wants to explore Fortnite-style crossovers
00:54:02 - Cyberpunk 2077’s Quest Director Gets Emotional About Resurgence
00:57:34 - Take Two has pulled out of an agreement with People Can Fly
01:00:28 - Far Cry 6 Game Of The Year edition has leaked
01:06:26 - Out today
01:08:50 - Squad Up: Frankfurtter sending love
01:09:26 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Bless & Kelsey Lewin
